gov.nasa.jpf.vm.serialize

Class DebugFilteringSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.AbstractSerializer
      • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.serialize.FilteringSerializer
        • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.serialize.DebugFilteringSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Processor<ElementInfo>, DebugStateSerializer, KernelState.ChangeListener, ReferenceProcessor, StateSerializer

    public class DebugFilteringSerializer
extends FilteringSerializer
implements DebugStateSerializer
    a FilteringSerializer that stores the serialized program state in a readable/diffable format. Automatically used by Debug..StateSet if the configured vm.serializer.class is FilteringSerializer
